tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (PRP I)) (VP (VBP hope) (SBAR (S (NP (NP (DT the) (NN rest)) (PP (IN of) (NP (DT this) (JJ little) (NN vacation)))) (VP (VBZ is) (ADJP (ADJP (JJR better)) (PP (IN than) (NP (DT the) (JJ past) (CD two) (NNS days)))))))) (: ...)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [hope/VBP nsubj>I/PRP ccomp>[better/JJR nsubj>[rest/NN det>the/DT nmod:of>[vacation/NN case>of/IN det>this/DT amod>little/JJ]] cop>is/VBZ nmod:than>[days/NNS case>than/IN det>the/DT amod>past/JJ nummod>two/CD]] punct>.../:]
